statements: SELECT * FROM workers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, role FROM workers WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT id, name, department FROM workers WHERE role = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM workers WHERE is_contractor = true;
SELECT name, role, department FROM workers WHERE id = 4;
SELECT * FROM workers WHERE name = 'John' AND department = 'HR';
SELECT name, role FROM workers WHERE department = 'Engineering' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM workers WHERE role = 'Manager' AND is_contractor = FALSE;
SELECT DISTINCT department FROM workers ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT name, role, department FROM workers WHERE is_contractor = TRUE ORDER BY department, name;
SELECT * FROM trained_personnel;
SELECT id, name, department FROM trained_personnel ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name FROM trained_personnel WHERE department='Engineering';
SELECT * FROM contractors WHERE contract_end > '2022-12-31';
SELECT id, name, company, contract_start FROM contractors ORDER BY contract_start ASC;
SELECT * FROM trained_personnel WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT name, department FROM trained_personnel WHERE training_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM trained_personnel ORDER BY training_date DESC;
SELECT name, department, training_date FROM trained_personnel WHERE name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM contractors WHERE contract_end > '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Personnel;
SELECT id, name FROM Contractors WHERE license_number = '12345';
SELECT name, job_title FROM Personnel ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, company FROM Contractors WHERE company LIKE 'XYZ%';
SELECT * FROM HazardousWasteHandling WHERE date_handled > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Personnel;
SELECT name, job_title FROM Personnel WHERE training_completed = true;
SELECT * FROM Contractors WHERE company = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT name, license_number FROM Contractors ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT Personnel.name, Contractors.company FROM Personnel JOIN Contractors ON Personnel.id = Contractors.id;
SELECT * FROM Personnel;
SELECT name, department FROM Personnel WHERE training_completed = true;
SELECT name, company_name FROM Contractors WHERE certification_status = false;
SELECT personnel_id, department FROM Personnel ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT * FROM Hazardous_Waste WHERE waste_type = 'Chemical' AND quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM Personnel WHERE training_completed = TRUE;
SELECT name, department FROM Personnel ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT * FROM Contractors WHERE certification_status = FALSE ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, company_name, certification_status FROM Contractors WHERE certification_status = TRUE;
SELECT name, waste_type, quantity FROM Personnel p JOIN Hazardous_Waste w ON p.personnel_id = w.waste_id;
SELECT * FROM personnel;
SELECT id, name, title FROM personnel WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT department, COUNT(*) FROM personnel GROUP BY department;
SELECT name, company, hazardous_certification FROM contractors WHERE hazardous_certification = true;
SELECT location, capacity FROM waste_sites WHERE capacity > 500;
SELECT * FROM personnel ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, title FROM personnel WHERE department = 'Engineering';
SELECT p.name, c.company, w.location FROM personnel p JOIN contractors c ON p.id = c.id JOIN waste_sites w ON p.id = w.id;
SELECT * FROM personnel_assignment WHERE date_completed IS NULL;
SELECT p.name, w.capacity, pc.category_name FROM personnel p JOIN waste_sites w ON p.site_id = w.id JOIN waste_categories pc ON p.category_id = pc.id;
